settings.name: HARIPRAKASSH P
settings.title: Java Full Stack Developer Trainee
settings.summary: Motivated Computer Science graduate with expertise in Java, OOPS, SQL, and backend development, eager to contribute to software development.

items.description: Trained in Core Java, JDBC, SQL, and backend development principles. Practiced Agile development methodology through sprints and code reviews.
Developed responsive user interfaces for a cross-platform mobile application using the Flutter framework and Dart programming language. Improved problem-solving skills through debugging and testing.

items.title: Bus Ticket Reservation System
items.description: Developed a console-based application for booking and managing bus tickets, focusing on robust backend logic and database interaction. Applied Object-Oriented Programming (OOPs) principles by creating classes for Bus, Passenger, and Booking to manage data effectively. Integrated a MySQL database using JDBC to handle all persistent data, including bus schedules, seat availability, and booking information.

items.title: Smart Citizen Website
items.description: Developed a web platform for citizens to report local civic issues using location-based data. Engineered an automatic notification system to alert the nearest responsible officer for timely resolution. Enhanced community engagement by implementing a feature for users to track the status of their reports.

items.degree: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering

items.institution: Shri Vidhya Matric Hr. Sec. School

items.title: Top 100, Socio-Tech Hackathon 2024
items.description: KPR College of Arts and Science, Coimbatore
